function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Impact of COVID-19 on coal and oil demand","Impact":"Reduction in demand for coal and oil, affecting the energy industry and economy.","Mitigation":"Development of alternative energy sources, diversification of the energy mix, and investment in renewable energy technologies.","Technologies":"Renewable energy technologies, energy storage systems, and energy management solutions.","People":"Energy industry workers, coal and oil producers, and communities reliant on the coal and oil industries.","Owner":"Energy companies, government energy agencies, and renewable energy developers."},{"Description":"Decline in global electricity demand during lockdown","Impact":"Reduction in electricity demand leading to changes in the energy supply and energy mix.","Mitigation":"Implementation of demand response programs, promotion of energy efficiency measures, and investment in smart grid technologies.","Technologies":"Smart grid technologies, demand response systems, and energy-efficient appliances.","People":"Electricity consumers, energy providers, and energy policy makers.","Owner":"Electricity providers, government energy agencies, and technology developers."},{"Description":"Unprecedented reduction in global CO2 emissions","Impact":"Dramatic decline in global greenhouse gas emissions, with positive environmental effects.","Mitigation":"Transition to sustainable and low-carbon energy sources, adoption of carbon capture and storage technologies, and implementation of carbon pricing mechanisms.","Technologies":"Renewable energy technologies, carbon capture and storage systems, and carbon pricing platforms.","People":"Global population, environmental advocates, and policymakers.","Owner":"Governments, environmental organizations, and sustainable energy companies."}]}
